Description: Painted pottery shabti of Djed-Khonsu(?), a Wʿb-priest of Amun(?) with a lappet-wig tied with a black fillet, an unmodelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two black hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; part of the foot has broken away.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
